title: Battery care claims charging 100% by alarm time but when I check it 90 mins before alarm, it's full
content:
Well, as battery care claims, when I charge it at night, it will systematically charge my pixel 5 by morning alarm time. That is, my phone would charge fully 100% by my morning alarm time and this way it protects the battery. However, today I checked and my phone was already full one and a half hour before alarm time!!!
Is it a fake feature? How can it protect battery overcharge this way?!
